title: Sports Info App Delves Into Sports Betting
itunes:title: Sports Info App Delves Into Sports Betting
description:
John Levy, Founder and CEO of theScore, talks about the sports media app incorporating legalized betting on games.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
